I’ve been reading bits here and there about Michael Moore’s new movie “Sicko,” (Wikipedia, IMDB) which supposedly exposes the horrors of the health care industry in America. Not surprisingly, the health care industry isn’t too happy about this, and has recently expressed a little bit of concern.

Intrigued by all this talk (and positive reactions), I decided that maybe I should take a gander at this movie myself. However, it would seem that there are no showings in Macon. Guess I’ll be turning to the good ‘old P2P method of acquiring this movie. I’ll be back with a little review after I watch it. I’m no fan of Michael Moore (I’m actually rather indifferent), but if it’s good enough, I’ll look into offering a copy (most likely a download or directions on how to get it) for your consumption.

Any recommendations, discouragements, or disputes about Sicko? Leave them in the comments.
